content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the character’s experience with exile is both alienating and enriching and how this experience contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the character’s experience with exile is both alienating and enriching and how this experience contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
